sentences.en: His nephew, Philocles, later became the first tragedian to win a victory over Sophocles' enormously successful tragedy "Oedipus Tyrannus."
sentences.cn: 后来，他的侄子菲罗塞尔超越了索福克勒斯极其成功的一部悲剧《俄狄浦斯王》，赢得了当时第一悲剧作家的称号。

sentences.en: In the ancient society , she was destined to be a tragedian.
sentences.cn: 晴雯一生有关男女情感之出入, 唯宝玉而已,洁身自爱,未曾逾越伦常.

sentences.en: She is regarded as the best tragedian on the English stage.
sentences.cn: 她被认为是英国戏剧舞台上最出色的悲剧演员.

sentences.en: She is regared as the best tragedian on the English stage.
sentences.cn: 她被认为是英国戏剧舞台上最出色的悲剧演员。

words.tran_cn: 悲剧的；悲剧性的；悲惨的；不幸的

trans.tran_en: an actor or writer of tragedy
